name: Waveform 2.0
description:
A grim future where humanity nearly ceased to exist, a single soldier bears the weight of saving the human race on his shoulders. A new form fo sound corrupted every machine with artifical intelligence, which led to them turning against their creators.

Only the weapons created by the machines are strong enough to destroy them, so humanity - in a last ditch effort - created a device that manipulates the received sound frequenzy of surrounding objects, which lets them be utilized against the enemy. But it has to be used with care because the weaponry is still extremly lethal to human beings.

Waveform 2.0 is a complete redesign of Waveform 1.0. While Waveform 1.0 featured melee combat and a loose interpretation of the frequenzy manipulation device, Waveform 2.0 scrapped its combat entirely and put more emphasis on manipulating the environment in favour of the player as well as puzzle solving while trying to avoid dangerous environmental hazards.
